title: Architect - Payments, Central Technology
content:
Come join the team at Zynga making an impact across all of the companyâ€™s games - Central Technology! We focus on shared client & server tech that drives the core gameplay experience under the hood. As a Software Architect, you will be responsible for the technical vision, design and enhancement and maintenance of Payments, in-app purchases and mobile direct store services at scale for mobile, web and other platforms used by all Zynga games.
MAIN RESPONSIBILITIES 

Architect, design, enhance and maintain Payments SDKs and backend services for all supported platforms
Maintain an understanding of end-to-end system interactions and architecture
Optimize and refactor existing services to improve reliability, scalability and to lower costs
Follow engineering best practices towards ensuring performance, reliability, and measurability at scale
Review detailed designs from others, align with Zynga-wide technical vision, and exercise technical leadership on the team and engineering organization
Advocate for and implement new technologies and engineering standards across the team
Evaluate, architect and implement new Payment systems and technologies
Work collaboratively across teams to ensure business requirements are successfully translated into technical solutions which follow engineering standards
Document and build implementation plans for architecture and system designs
Hands-on approach where needed including contributing to feature development, supporting Payments services in production, and contributing to on-call and support
Provide technical mentorship to other engineers, growing their skills and providing career guidance and driving a culture of technical excellence in software development and infrastructure design

REQUIRED SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE 

B.S. in Computer Science, or equivalent
8+ years of professional experience in software development of cloud based software
Experience programming RESTful services using C#,  C++ or Java
Strong familiarity and experience using AWS and/or other cloud computing platforms (IaaS, PaaS, SaaS)
Experience building performant, scalable systems that adapt and grow to meet customer needs
Experience with containers and Kubernetes/EKS
Experience with database systems (SQL, NoSQL)
Experience with object oriented and independent design of applications or systems
Deep understanding of algorithms, design patterns, debugging and performance optimization
Working knowledge in at least one of the following:  Unity, Unreal, iPhone SDK, Xcode, Android SDK, HTML5
Working knowledge of mobile landscape, architectures, trends, and emerging technologies
Familiarity with Regulatory (e.g. SOX, GDPR) requirements
Excellent interpersonal skills and the ability to work with senior leadership with confidence and clarity
Familiarity with web development using JS, Angular and React is a plus

WHAT WE OFFER YOU

Competitive salary, bonus plan and ESPP (Employee Stock Purchase Plan)
401K Company Match Contribution (US)
RRSP/DPSP company match contribution (Canada)
Health coverage, dental, disability, critical illness, EAP, and life insurance (Canada)
Medical, dental, vision, EAP, life insurance, and disability benefits (US)
Virtual mental health and neurodiversity support programs
Global Fitness reimbursement program
Global Wellbeing Program
Financial wellness program with unlimited access to certified financial planners
Discretionary Time Off policy for many employees
Family planning support program
Generous paid parental, pregnancy-related disability, caregiver, and compassionate leaves
Subsidized Back-up child care
Zynga happy hours and frequent employee events
Flexible working hours on many teams
Culture of diversity and inclusion including employee resource groups
Work with cool people and impact millions of daily players

As part of our Diversity and Inclusion Strategy we would like to collect demographic information from job candidates to identify and implement strategies to understand and improve equal opportunity for all at Zynga. Completion of this information is entirely voluntary and any details you provide will not be considered in the hiring process. Zynga will anonymize demographic information for reporting and analytics to gain a better understanding of our hiring process. This  information will only be used internally within Zynga and stored securely on our systems.  

For Zynga’s full privacy notice, click here for US Job Applicant privacy notice and here for the Outside of the US Job Applicant Privacy Notice . You can email Privacy@zynga.com for more information regarding the collections and use of your data.
